name: Barracks
uniques: Must have an owned [Hut] within [3] tiles
New [non-[Air]] units start with [15] XP [in this city]
Triggers a global alert upon completion <when number of [[Barracks] Buildings] is equal to [1]>

name: Beast Lair
uniques: Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
Must have an owned [Tame Beast den] within [3] tiles

name: Wildmen's Curse
uniques: Triggers a global alert upon completion
Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
